attributes.review: This app was very bad. My phone was TRAUMATIZED afterwards. It has MANY MANY BUGS AND ISSUES!!! It made my phone freeze up and it ran VERY SLOW! I would’ve LOVED to support this app but i simply can’t. I HATED it!!! The software caused frogs and bugs outside to make a very loud racket and INVADE MY HOME!!! This app cause the rest of my family members to SHUN me & I was DISOWNED!!! This app caused me MANY problems. THIS IS THE WORST APP EVER!!! VERY BAD!!!
attributes.title: VERY BAD APP

attributes.review: I shouldn’t even have to explain why this app is just a terrible, terrible thing.  It was made for the cheeto that has DESTROYED our country.  The app even gave my phone and other friends phones multiple viruses that cost hundreds of dollars to get rid of.  I’m extremely disappointed.
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: I downloaded this to keep up with our president but the app seems to have some weird celebrity as the poster face?? Don’t know where that came from, also the app itself is very slow and always crashes. Would be easier to just delete the app in full.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever!

attributes.review: This app was just terrible! When I downloaded it I immediately regretted it! It’s not worth your time it is stupid and just plain awful, don’t waste your time on this app it deserves a zero star but I can’t do that, so listen to me and don’t waste your time on this gosh awful app
attributes.title: Absolutely awful

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to help my president and it ended up putting a virus in my phone and i had to get a brand new one! My phone got super hot after i opened the app and i tried to get through it and eventually i couldn't take it anymore and i dropped it and broke it!
attributes.title: Absolutely Horrible

attributes.review: I downloaded this application and my cell phone started glitching as if it had been hacked, so I deleted the application and my cell phone completely stopped working. Long story short I ended up getting a brand new cell phone because this application gave my cell phone a virus
attributes.title: Wow
